dublinCore.title: 113 HR 1810 IH: To revise the boundaries of John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Gasparilla Island Unit in Florida.
dublinCore.rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Radelintroduced the following bill; which was referred to theCommittee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To revise the boundaries of John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Gasparilla Island Unit in Florida.

section.header: John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Gasparilla Island Unit, Florida

subsection.text:
The map subtitledGasparilla Island Unit FL–70Pincluded in the set of maps entitledCoastal Barrier Resources Systemreferred to in section 4(a) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act( 16 U.S.C. 3503(a)
) and relating to the Gasparilla Island Unit in Florida is hereby replaced by another map relating to the same unit entitledJohn H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Corrected Gasparilla Unit FL–70/FL–70P, draft dated May 23, 2012.

TheSecretary of the Interiorshall keep the replacement map referred to insubsection (a)on file and available for inspection in accordance with section 4(b) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act( 16 U.S.C. 3503(b)
).
